snippet: Kasey Kahne got the jump on Jeff Gordon on a final restart with two laps left and pulled away to win a Nascar Sprint Cup race at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa.
abstract: Kasey Kahne wins a Nascar Sprint Cup race at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kasey Kahne got the jump on Jeff Gordon on a final restart with two laps left and pulled away to win a Nascar Sprint Cup race at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa.
